BE-001.name: Database Configuration
BE-001.description: Create async SQLAlchemy database configuration with engine, session factory, Base class, and FastAPI dependency

BE-002.name: Settings Configuration
BE-002.description: Create Pydantic Settings for environment configuration with DATABASE_URL, SECRET_KEY, CORS_ORIGINS, and other app settings
BE-002.detailed_requirements: Use Pydantic Settings for environment variables. Include DATABASE_URL, SECRET_KEY, ALGORITHM, ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES, REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRE_DAYS, CORS_ORIGINS, DEBUG, ENVIRONMENT, APP_NAME. Load from .env file. Provide sensible defaults. Use Field() for validation and descriptions.

BE-003.name: Security Utilities
BE-003.description: Create password hashing and JWT token utilities using passlib and python-jose
BE-003.detailed_requirements: Use passlib with bcrypt for password hashing. Use python-jose for JWT tokens. Implement: hash_password(password: str) -> str, verify_password(plain: str, hashed: str) -> bool, create_access_token(data: dict, expires_delta: timedelta = None) -> str, verify_token(token: str) -> dict. Use settings from config.py for SECRET_KEY and ALGORITHM. Include full type hints and docstrings.

BE-004.name: Base Repository
BE-004.description: Create generic async CRUD repository base class with SQLAlchemy
BE-004.detailed_requirements: Generic repository with type parameter T. Methods: get(id), get_all(skip, limit), create(obj), update(obj), delete(id). All methods async. Use SQLAlchemy async session. Return Optional[T] for get, list[T] for get_all. Use generics and TypeVar.

BE-005.name: Exception Handlers
BE-005.description: Create custom exception classes and FastAPI exception handlers
BE-005.detailed_requirements: Custom exception classes inheriting from Exception. AppException base class with status_code and detail. NotFoundException(message: str), UnauthorizedException(message: str), ValidationException(message: str, errors: dict). FastAPI exception handlers dictionary for use in app.add_exception_handler().

BE-006.name: User Model
BE-006.description: Create SQLAlchemy User model with UUID primary key and timestamps
BE-006.detailed_requirements: SQLAlchemy model inheriting from Base. Fields: id (UUID primary key), email (String, unique, indexed), hashed_password (String), full_name (String), is_active (Boolean, default True), created_at (DateTime), updated_at (DateTime with onupdate). Use UUID with server_default. Add __tablename__ = 'users'. Use Mapped and mapped_column.

BE-007.name: Auth Schemas
BE-007.description: Create Pydantic schemas for authentication requests and responses
BE-007.detailed_requirements: Pydantic models with BaseModel. RegisterRequest: email (EmailStr), password (str, min_length=8), full_name (str). LoginRequest: email (EmailStr), password (str). TokenResponse: access_token (str), refresh_token (str), token_type (str, default='bearer'). UserResponse: id (UUID), email (str), full_name (str), created_at (datetime). Use ConfigDict(from_attributes=True) for response models.

BE-008.name: User Repository
BE-008.description: Create User repository extending BaseRepository with get_by_email method
BE-008.detailed_requirements: Inherit from BaseRepository[User]. Add method: get_by_email(email: str) -> Optional[User]. Use select() with where clause. Return scalar_one_or_none().

BE-009.name: Auth Service
BE-009.description: Create authentication service with register, login, and user management
BE-009.detailed_requirements: AuthService class with __init__(session: AsyncSession). Methods: register(data: RegisterRequest) -> User, login(email: str, password: str) -> tuple[User, str], get_current_user(token: str) -> User, update_profile(user_id: UUID, full_name: str) -> User. Raise appropriate exceptions on errors. Use UserRepository for database operations.

BE-010.name: Auth Dependencies
BE-010.detailed_requirements: FastAPI dependencies using Depends(). get_current_user: extract token from Authorization header, verify token and return User. get_current_active_user: call get_current_user and check is_active. Raise HTTPException(401) if unauthorized.

BE-011.name: Auth Endpoints
BE-011.detailed_requirements: APIRouter with prefix='/auth'. POST /register: RegisterRequest -> UserResponse + token. POST /login: LoginRequest -> TokenResponse. POST /logout: requires auth -> success response. GET /me: requires auth -> UserResponse. PUT /me: requires auth, update data -> UserResponse. Use Depends(get_db) for database session. Use Depends(get_current_user) for protected routes.

BE-012.name: API Router Setup
BE-012.description: Create main API router combining all endpoints
BE-012.detailed_requirements: Create APIRouter with prefix='/api/v1'. Include auth router. Export as api_router.

BE-013.name: App Factory
BE-013.description: Create FastAPI application instance with middleware and routers
BE-013.detailed_requirements: Create FastAPI app instance. Add CORS middleware with origins from settings. Include api_router. Add exception handlers. Add startup and shutdown events if needed. Configure docs at /docs.

BE-014.name: Alembic Setup
BE-014.detailed_requirements: Configure Alembic for async SQLAlchemy. Import Base from app.core.database. Import all models. Set target_metadata = Base.metadata. Configure async engine.

BE-015.name: Initial Migration
BE-015.description: Create initial database migration for users table
BE-015.detailed_requirements: Create users table migration. Use alembic revision --autogenerate. Review and adjust generated migration.
